title: Game freeze and stay on the front of the screen
body:
Sometimes in game, LoL freeze: 
- I can alt+tab but if i choose another window, LoL stay in front of my screen.
- I can't alt+f4.
- If i ctrl+alt+suppr, i have the blue screen where i can open the task monitor,but if i do so, it pop behind my frozen Lol.
The only thing i've found is to ctrl+alt+suppr and reboot my computer from here.
How can i force quit LoL ?
I'm on Windows 10 64bits. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hmmmm it sounds like League is locking up so hard that you're not able to get your PC to shift the focus whatsoever. At that point, you may need to restart if nothing else is working, but we should mostly try to figure out why it's happening in the first place. 

There's a number of different things that could be causing those freezes, but we can start hitting some of the basic steps with this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Let me know what helps, and if needed we can do a little more troubleshooting!

Thanks for the reply, i'll try to follow the guide, but this bug happen occasionally (~1 of 6 game). It might take some time to find the solution.
I'm a noob windows user, is there another command to shutdown the game ?
